title: Engineer, Front End
description:
Overview Of The Company


Fox Corporation


Under the FOX banner, we produce and distribute content through some of the world’s leading and most valued brands, including: FOX News Media, FOX Sports, FOX Entertainment, FOX Television Stations and Tubi Media Group. We empower a diverse range of creators to imagine and develop culturally significant content, while building an organization that thrives on creative ideas, operational expertise and strategic thinking.


Job Description


Fox is looking to add a Front End Engineer to our Platforms team. This person will join a fast growing team that builds, deploys, and distribute our vast content ecosystem. You will architect and build scalable, durable and flexible technology that powers our consumer-facing applications and contribute to our content management tools.


About The Role


In addition to being a hands-on technical leader, you will also work with our Product, Project, and Operations teams to service our multiple business partners with enterprise-level solutions. You will contribute to our architecture roadmap and lead a team of talented developers as they plan, develop and ship best-in-class tech.


a Snapshot Of Your Responsibilities
  • You will own two core pieces of our product:
    • Our consumer facing front-end applications, written in Nuxt.js, which are engineered for performance, scalability, and SEO
    • An internal Vue.js application that controls templating for the consumer-facing front-ends
  • You will manage and mentor a team of developers working on these projects. This team is expected to grow as our products and services are adopted across all Fox brands
  • You will contribute to our product roadmap
  • You will work on tooling that increases productivity and makes the develop-to-deploy pipeline run smoothly
  • You will prototype new tools and applications, as the scope of work and team capability continue to increase
  • You will contribute to project planning and delivery
  • Be a leader during our transition to the Scalable Agile Framework


What You Will Need


  • Experience managing highly performant Agile teams
  • Experience with editorial systems like WordPress, with background in development of editorial UX and custom plugins
  • History of executing large enterprise scale product delivery, especially with tasks requiring coordination across multiple engineering teams
  • Strong background in JavaScript, especially with Node.js
  • Background in Continuous Delivery & Continuous Integration processes
  • Excellent communication skills, especially in outlining technical requirements and documentation for a development team
  • Javascript/Typescript
  • JS frameworks (Vue/Nuxt preferred, React/Next helpful)
  • Node
  • Docker
  • Github
  • Jira

#foxtech


We are an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, gender identity, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. We will consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with applicable law.


At FOX, we foster a culture and environment where everyone feels welcome and can thrive. We are deeply committed to diversity, equity, and inclusion, including attracting, retaining, and promoting diverse talent across our company. We live in a diverse world, with different ideas and different perspectives that come together to spark new ideas and make great things happen. That means reflecting the diversity of the world around us is critical to our company’s success. We ensure that our viewers, communities and employees feel heard, represented, and celebrated both on screen and off.


Pursuant to state and local pay disclosure requirements, the pay range for this role, with final offer amount dependent on education, skills, experience, and location is: $118,000.00-133,500.00 annually for New York City and Westchester County, NY. This role is also eligible for an annual discretionary bonus, various benefits, including medical/dental/vision, insurance, a 401(k) plan, paid time off, and other benefits in accordance with applicable plan documents. Benefits for Union represented employees will be in accordance with the applicable collective bargaining agreement.
